content.text:
# Republic of Ireland women's national volleyball team

The '''Republic of Ireland women's national volleyball team (recognized as Ireland''' by FIVB) represents the Republic of Ireland in international women's volleyball senior competitions and friendly matches.
As of 2020, Ireland also features a U17 national volleyball team which is coached by Jenny King and whose team captain is Maria Jones.

* [http://www.volleyballireland.com Volleyball Ireland]
